NAME: Name
TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_TITLE: Welcome to the Eucalyptus Digital Almanac
TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_DESCRIPTION: The Eucalyptus Digital Almanac is a mobile application to promote citizen science on the impacts of the expansion of eucalyptus cultivation areas in Brazil.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_TITLE: How to use the Digital Almanac
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_DESCRIPTION: Explore the content by browsing the homepage and accessing what you want to read. In Almanaque Digital there is a search tool that makes the experience much more focused and faster, taking you directly to the content you are looking for.
CONTENT_ABOUT1: Mobile application prototype for the promotion of citizen science of the impacts of the expansion of eucalyptus cultivation areas in Brazil
CONTENT_ABOUT2: Developed as a requirement for approval in the discipline of Applied Software Engineering, by the Specialization Course in Software Engineering at the University of Vale do Rio dos Sinos - UNISINOS
CONTENT_ABOUT4: Supervisor: Master Professor Josiane Brietzke Porto
